variations.template: Treat them and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until your next turn.
rts: Treat them and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until your next turn.

variations.template: While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. Each one phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.
rts: While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. Each one phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.
